snippet: The police are looking into the possibility that a Kaufman County district attorney and his wife who were shot dead last Saturday may have known the killer.
abstract: Police looking for clues in fatal shooting of Kaufman, Tex, local district attorney Mike McLelland and his wife Cynthia are exploring possibility that the couple may have known the killer.

byline.original: By MANNY FERNANDEZ and SERGE F. KOVALESKI
byline.contributor: Sheelagh McNeill contributed research from New York.

lead_paragraph: The police are looking into the possibility that a Kaufman County district attorney and his wife who were shot dead last Saturday may have known the killer.

headline.seo: Investigation Continues of Shootings in Kaufman, Tex.
headline.main: Texas Police Seeking Clues to How Killer Got in Home
headline.print_headline: Texas Police Seeking Clues To How Killer Got in Home
